lines.text: Sorry to barge in when you've got your snouts in the trough.
There's a mouse sitting in there, bold as brass, cleaning his whiskers!
He wont be so confident when he sees my pussy.

[holding a small piglet]
Ooh, d'ya know, it's right puttin' me off bacon.

[Mr. Humphries has just been woken up]
I have just aroused Mr. Humphries!
